Row 2 "cold feet": Chinese 手脚冰冷 (cold hands and feet) is TOO LITERAL - idiom should be 临阵退缩 (which appears correctly in row 17-18). Row 6 "pain in the neck": 颈部疼痛 is LITERAL (neck pain) not idiomatic - should be 麻烦事/讨厌的事.
